sentences.en: "I know you," he said flatly, matter-of-fact, neutral in tone.
sentences.cn: “我认识你。”他平淡地说道，就事论事，不带任何感情。

sentences.en: an accessory before the fact.
sentences.cn: 案前同谋。

sentences.en: First of all, we need to know the facts of the case.
sentences.cn: 首先，我们需要了解案子的相关事实。

sentences.en: He is a dull writer and that's a fact.
sentences.cn: 他写的东西很没意思，真的。

sentences.en: it is a fact of life that young girls write horrible things about people in their diaries.
sentences.cn: 一个不争的事实是女孩在日记中把人描绘得很可怕。

sentences.en: It may be a well-known fact, but I didn't know it.
sentences.cn: 这可能是人所共知的事实，但我却不知道。

sentences.en: It's not that difficult. As a matter of fact, it'squite easy.
sentences.cn: 这并不那么困难，实际上，容易得很。

sentences.en: Mona remains unshaken by her ordeal and is matter-of-fact about her courage.
sentences.cn: 莫娜不为她经历的这场磨难所动，对自己表现出的勇气也态度淡然。

sentences.en: Our decision to build the museum in Hartlepool was influenced by the fact that there were no national museums in the North East.
sentences.cn: 我们之所以决定在哈特尔浦建造博物馆，是因为东北地区没有国家级的博物馆。

sentences.en: She applauds the fact that they are promoting new ideas.
sentences.cn: 他们在宣传新思想，对此她表示赞许。

sentences.en: That sounds rather simple, but in fact it's very difficult.
sentences.cn: 那听来简单，但实际上很难。

sentences.en: The book is full of facts about the World Cup.
sentences.cn: 这本书全是有关世界杯的真实信息。

sentences.en: The fact of the matter is that student finances are stretched.
sentences.cn: 关键是奖学金有限。

sentences.en: The indisputable fact is that computers carry out logical operations.
sentences.cn: 不容置疑的事实是，电脑执行逻辑操作指令。

sentences.en: The line between fact and fiction is becoming blurred.
sentences.cn: 事实和虚构之间的界限正变得模糊起来。

sentences.en: The lungs are in fact constructed of thousands of tiny tubes.
sentences.cn: 肺实际上由上千条细微的气管构成。

sentences.en: The offending comment was in fact a heckle from an audience member.
sentences.cn: 这番冒犯性的话实际上是一名观众的诘难。

sentences.en: The slow-worm is in fact not a snake but a legless lizard.
sentences.cn: 蛇蜥其实不是蛇，而是无脚的蜥蜴。

sentences.en: Their healthy image disguises the fact that they are highly processed foods.
sentences.cn: 它们看上去有益健康，实则掩盖了其为精加工食品这一事实。

sentences.en: You have to admit that you are, in fact, in difficulties.
sentences.cn: 你不得不承认，你事实上是陷入了困境。
